entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
